meanings.definition: Preventing or reducing the formation of fog on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The antifog goggles kept my vision clear during the swim meet.
meanings.sent2: I bought antifog spray for my glasses to stop them from getting blurry.
meanings.sent3: The antifog mirror in the bathroom never lets the steam ruin my selfies.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor acted like an antifog shield in the midst of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The antifog windshield on the car made driving in the rain much safer.

meanings.definition: A substance or treatment used to prevent fogging.
meanings.sent1: The scuba diver applied antifog to the mask before diving into the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The antifog on the car windows made driving in the early morning much easier.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved using antifog to keep the audience guessing.
meanings.sent4: The antifog solution worked wonders on the bathroom mirror after a hot shower.
meanings.sent5: The ski resort provided antifog wipes to ensure clear vision on the slopes.
